    • Method Detail

      • setProgressBar

        void setProgressBar(boolean active)
        Enable/disable a progress bar while data is loading.
        Parameters:
        active - true for enable, false for disable.

      • showStates

        void showStates(java.util.List<State> states)
        Show a list of states in the current view
        Parameters:
        states - the states to show.

      • showStations

        void showStations(java.util.List<Station> stations)
        Show a list of stations in the current view
        Parameters:
        stations - the stations to show.

      • showFavourites

        void showFavourites(java.util.List<Station> favourites)
        Show favourite stations in the current view
        Parameters:
        favourites - the favourites to show.

      • showObservationsUi

        void showObservationsUi(Station station)
        Show observations in the the observations view
        Parameters:
        station - the station to determine which observations to show.

      • setActionListener

        Set the Presenter on initialisation
        Parameters:
        presenter - the presenter to use.
